Title: Relates to expanding eligibility for unemployment benefits to furloughed federal employees
Summary: Relates to expanding eligibility for unemployment benefits to furloughed federal employees that are residents of New York state, and are either required to work without compensation or are placed on unpaid leave as a result of a lapse in appropriations by the United States government beginning on or after December 22, 2018.
LawCode: Amd ยง591, add ยง591-b, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to unemployment benefits for qualified federal employees
